question.title: How to extract only visible text from pdf page?
question.body:
I am trying to extract the text from pdf, but the problem it is also reading the hidden text as well. How I could solve this?

I tried below code

    public static void iTextExample() {
    String pdfFilePath = "path_to_pdf_file.pdf";
    try {
        PdfReader reader = new PdfReader(pdfFilePath);
                    int pageNo = 10;
        String pageContent = PdfTextExtractor.getTextFromPage(reader,pageNo);
        System.out.println("Page Content: \n" + pageContent);
        reader.close();
    } catch (IOException e) {
        e.printStackTrace();
    }
}

but the code also reading the hidden text.

example: Visible text on page

Contents at a Glance Introduction xxiii Chapter 1 Introduction 1 Chapter 2 Mechanisms 17 Chapter 3 Technologies 39 ... Index

Text after extraction from iText
